subject: Hockey, Ice
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Vadnais, who began his career when the N.H.L. had six teams, won Stanley Cup titles with Montreal in 1968 and Boston in 1972 before playing with the Rangers.
snippet: Vadnais, who began his career when the N.H.L. had six teams, won Stanley Cup titles with Montreal in 1968 and Boston in 1972 before playing with the Rangers.
